message: Let's make a deal! I propose I take $60 and you get $40.  It's important to decide quickly before inflation eats into our potential gains.
Your turn, Alice. I'm willing to be generous, but let's make this quick. Time is money, especially with this inflation!
Bob, this inflation is no joke!  I'm feeling the pinch already. I'll take $55, you take $45, and let's close this out before we lose more.
